title: Drone Photogrammetry
description: Fully open-source custom built drone to map images to 3D world coordinates. Funded by Brown's School of Engineering.

title: Genetic Salesman
description: Genetic algorithm to solve the traveling salesman problem; includes an overview paper discussing NP-Hardness, sampling with bias and parameter tuning.

title: Auto Roaster
description: Tripartite computer vision system consisting of face detection, ResNet50 multi-label classificaiton and GPT-3 for a personalized roast generation.

title: Tag Track
description: Suggestions and issues tracker for Telegram's bug testing program, synced with Trello and used by over 10K testers and developers.
